text: pinnar, kiyama nalil avan avarkalai ilivu patuttuvan; "evarkalai ninkal enakku inaiya(na teyvankala)kki, avarkalaipparri (muhminkalitam) pinankik kontiruntirkalo, avarkal enke?" Ena (avarkalitam) ketpan; evarkalukkuk kalviyarivu kotukkappattato avarkal; "niccayamaka inru ilivum vetanaiyum kahpirkal mitu tan" enru kuruvarkal
